mapper.select: SELECT a.product_code, a.product_name, a.price, b.category_name, a.is_displayed, a.product_desc, c.uuid_filename, a.registration_date FROM tbl_product a LEFT JOIN tbl_category b on a.category_code = b.category_code JOIN tbl_product_image c on a.thumbnail_path = c.thumbnail_path
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_product (product_name, price, category_code, is_displayed, product_desc, thumbnail_path) values (#{productName}, #{price}, #{categoryCode}, #{isDisplayed}, #{productDesc}, #{thumbnailPath})
select last_insert_id()
